document_data.name: Grym Fartreader
document_data.mainbody: '''Grym Fartreader''' was an adventurer that lived during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Grym's lasting legacy was a journal entry left within the depths of the [[Underdark]], that remained nearly a century after their untimely death.
document_data.History: Grym's party ventured into a group of dungeons beneath [[Roth√© Valley]] in the {{YearlinkName|1385}}. After encountering [[duergar]] that accused them of wielding dangerous magic, the group was beset by a cave-in on the fifth day of their expedition. While searching for a way past a set of locked doors, Grym became no more after being engulfed by a [[gelatinous cube]].
